subtitleNullable: Almost 25000 images of rooms of houses and streets
descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains 2 folders with images of different rooms of houses and street views.
The **house data** consist few categories such as: bath, bed, din, kitchen and living.
The **street data** consist few categories such as: apartment, church, garage, house, industrial, office building, retail and roofs.

I took pictures of rooms [here](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/robinreni/house-rooms-image-dataset) and pictures of houses [here](https://github.com/zhu-xlab/Benchmark-of-streetview-image-of-individual-building-instance), resized them to 224x224, removed Google watermarks and merged 2 datasets together.

In general, I used this data for my tasks, but decided that this data set might be useful to someone else, if so feel free to upvote me 🤗
title: House Rooms & Streets Image Dataset
subtitle: Almost 25000 images of rooms of houses and streets
description:
This dataset contains 2 folders with images of different rooms of houses and street views.
The **house data** consist few categories such as: bath, bed, din, kitchen and living.
The **street data** consist few categories such as: apartment, church, garage, house, industrial, office building, retail and roofs.

I took pictures of rooms [here](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/robinreni/house-rooms-image-dataset) and pictures of houses [here](https://github.com/zhu-xlab/Benchmark-of-streetview-image-of-individual-building-instance), resized them to 224x224, removed Google watermarks and merged 2 datasets together.

In general, I used this data for my tasks, but decided that this data set might be useful to someone else, if so feel free to upvote me 🤗
